message:
I noticed that the requirements.txt that specifies Django >= 1.2.5 was part of the 2011-03-24 commit. 
I assume that previous commits worked with lower versions of Django..?

What are features are being used that requires Django 1.2+?
Looking at the code, I can see at least 1 thing: the multi-database feature requires 1.2.x
JSONField API can be a troublemaker
